column3: What I'd really like is to get tool-based ensemble fuzzing up and running, but my experiments right now are showing the tools may be not-ready-for-prime-time.  The DeepState ensembler (sort of) works right now, but porting doesn't seem like a good approach.
Concept ACK. I might test with Debian.
Please squash your commits according to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits
I think `./autogen.sh` is required before `./configure` since this is a fresh checkout :)
